a,b,c = map(int,input().split())
print(min(b//a,c)) 


a,b,c = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while b >= a and count < c:
    b -= a


    count += 1
print(count)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while b >= a and count < c:
    b -= a
    count += 1
print(count)

A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count <= C:
    B -= A
    count += 1
print(count)
